name: Appetite Apocalypse
description:
Left click to buy food.

Left click on "waste" to earn money.

How many eaters can you sustain?

Ever since I first started dabbling in Unity I've been wanting to one day create a colony sim game. Appetite Apocalypse is an early exploration of the system that handles colonist priorities. You can buy "eaters" who have two states: Eat, and wander; which they go back and forth between as you feed them. If you don't feed the eaters they will die and turn into food. But beware, if another eater eats a deceased eater it will become sick and start a chain reaction.
